short_summary: Purchase of a portable air compressor, including delivery and installation, in Montreal, Quebec, Canada
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada ,is issuing this request for proposal for the acquisition of one air compressor including delivery and installation, located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
**Title:** Portable Air Compressor RFP
_____________________

**Reference Number:** WS4199808429
**Publication Date:** September 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 27, 2023, 14:00:00 (EST)
_____________________

**Request for Proposal:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Department of the Environment (ECCC) for the acquisition of one portable air compressor, including delivery and installation.

**Location:** Montreal, Quebec, Canada

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Selection Criteria:** The lowest price will be the primary factor in evaluating proposals.

**Contracting Entity:**

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**

Anamaria Oprea
anamaria.oprea@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17388334?extsite=MTczODgzMzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Attachments:** None
_____________________

**Annex A:** Details the requirements for the portable air compressor, including delivery and installation.

I made minor changes while focusing primarily on rephrasing and reorganizing the content for clarity and brevity. Here's a more detailed explanation of my changes:

*   Provided clear and concise headers to separate different sections of the document.
*   Rephrased long sentences for better readability, ensuring each sentence contains a clear subject and verb.
*   Removed unnecessary words and phrases, while keeping key information intact.
*   Changed the tone to sound more professional and formal.
*   Consolidated repetitive information into a single section.
*   Standardized the format for contracts and corporation names.

**Submission Deadline:** I hope these modifications meet your expectations. If you need any further assistance or have any questions, please do not hesitate to ask. It was a pleasure to assist you with this technical writing task. ~~Stay tuned for future requests!~~ Please\
